exception.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"abc123","salary":"3000","age":"40"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("applicatioin/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

exception.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"xyz123","salary":"34","age":"43"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("applicatioin/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

exception.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"pqr123","salary":"343","age":"34"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("applicatioin/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
